Set this quaternion so that it acts as a rotation taking the e1,e2,e3 basis vectors to x,y,z.

Obtain the axis and angle of rotation specified by this quaternion.

toMatrix(...)
Obtain a 3x3 rotation matrix equivalent to the rotation specified by this quaternion.

fromEuler(...)
Static Method

 

Construct a quaternion from an Euler angle sequence.

Parameters:
  • angles - Sequence of 3 Euler angles.
  • order - The order to apply the Euler angle sequence.
  • inDegrees - True to indicate that angles are in degrees (default), or False for radians.

rotateFrame(...)

 

Rotate co-ordinate frame of vectors using this quaternion.

Equivalent to q.conjugate*v*q.

Parameters:
  • v - 3xN np.ndarray of column vectors.
Returns:
The vectors as they appear in the rotated co-ordinate frame obtained by applying the rotation specified by this quaternion to their current co-ordinate frame.

rotateVector(...)

 

Rotate vectors using this quaternion.

Equivalent to q*v*q.conjugate.

Parameters:
  • v - 3xN np.ndarray of column vectors.
Returns:
The vectors as they appear in their current co-ordinate frame after applying the rotation specified by this quaternion to them.

setFromEuler(...)

 

Set this quaternion from an Euler angle sequence.

Parameters:
  • angles - Sequence of 3 Euler angles.
  • order - The order to apply the Euler angle sequence.
  • inDegrees - True to indicate that angles are in degrees (default), or False for radians.

toEuler(...)

 

Convert this quaternion to a corresponding Euler angle sequence.

Parameters:
  • order - The order of the desired Euler angle sequence. Choices are 'zyx' for standard aerospace sequence (default), or 'zxy' for order used in BVH files.
  • inDegrees - True to obtain angles in degrees (default), or False for radians.
Returns:
Sequence of Euler angles.
